title: It’s Black Friday, and here are the best shopping deals we could find
description: Beat the crowds with our list of cool stuff to buy—updated throughout the weekend.
author: Ars Staff
excerpt: Beat the crowds with our list of cool stuff to buy—updated throughout the weekend.
text: Vende animam tuam pro commercio Beat the crowds with our list of cool stuff to buy—updated throughout the weekend. Merry Post-Turkey Commerce Day Weekend! Credit: Satyrenko / Getty Images The leaves have turned, the turkey has been eaten, the parades are over, and the football has been watched—the only thing left to do is to try to hide from increasingly uncomfortable family conversations by going out and shopping for things! It's the holiday tradition that not only makes us feel good, but also (apocryphally) drags the balance sheets of businesses the world over into profitability—hence "Black Friday!" Our partners in the e-commerce side of the business have spent days assembling massive lists for you all to peruse—lists of home deals and video game deals and all kinds of other things. Does that special someone in your life need, like, a security camera? Or a tablet? Or, uh—(checks list)—some board games? We've got all those things and more! A couple of quick notes: First, we're going to be updating this list throughout the weekend as things change, so if you don't see anything that tickles your fancy right now, check back in a few hours! Additionally, although we're making every effort to keep our prices accurate, deals are constantly shifting around, and an item's actual price might have drifted from what we list. Caveat emptor and all that. So, with that out of the way, let's make like *NSYNC and buy, buy, buy! html:
Vende animam tuam pro commercio

Beat the crowds with our list of cool stuff to buy—updated throughout the weekend.

Merry Post-Turkey Commerce Day Weekend! Credit: Satyrenko / Getty Images

The leaves have turned, the turkey has been eaten, the parades are over, and the football has been watched—the only thing left to do is to try to hide from increasingly uncomfortable family conversations by going out and shopping for things! It's the holiday tradition that not only makes us feel good, but also (apocryphally) drags the balance sheets of businesses the world over into profitability—hence "Black Friday!"

Our partners in the e-commerce side of the business have spent days assembling massive lists for you all to peruse—lists of home deals and video game deals and all kinds of other things. Does that special someone in your life need, like, a security camera? Or a tablet? Or, uh—(checks list)—some board games? We've got all those things and more!

A couple of quick notes: First, we're going to be updating this list throughout the weekend as things change, so if you don't see anything that tickles your fancy right now, check back in a few hours! Additionally, although we're making every effort to keep our prices accurate, deals are constantly shifting around, and an item's actual price might have drifted from what we list. Caveat emptor and all that.

So, with that out of the way, let's make like *NSYNC and buy, buy, buy!

Laptop and tablet deals

  • ReMarkable 2 Bundle with Book Folio for $499 ($70 off)
  • Asus Chromebook Plus CX34 ($320) ($179 off)
  • Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 Series for $599 ($100 off)
  • OnePlus Pad 2 Android Tablet for $479 ($70 off)
  • Samsung Galaxy Tab S10+ for $850 ($150 off)
  • Datafy Kindle Page Turner for $16 ($3 off)
  • GrandPad Tablet for Elders for $350 ($100 off)

Headphone deals

  • AirPods Pro (2nd Gen) for $154 ($46 off)
  • AirPods Max (USB-C) for $500 ($49 off)
  • Beats Fit Pro for $150 ($50 off)
  • Beats Studio Buds + Wireless Earbuds for $130 ($40 off)
  • Soundpeats Air4 Pro for $64 ($16 off)
  • Nothing Ear (a) Wireless Earbuds for $69 ($30 off)
  • Bose QuietComfort Ultra Headphones for $329 ($100 off)
  • Jabra Elite 8 Active (Gen 2) for $170 ($60 off)
  • Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones for $298 ($52 off)
  • Earpeace Music Pro Earplugs for $31 ($13 off)
  • Jabra Elite 4 Wireless Earbuds for $70 ($20 off)
  • Technics EAH-AZ80 earbuds for $195 ($80 off)
  • Beats Studio Pro Headphones for $160 ($90 off)
  • Jabra Elite 10 Gen 2 Wireless Earbuds for $200 ($80 off)
  • JBL Endurance Peak 3 earbuds for $70 ($20 off)
  • Soundcore by Anker Space A40 Earbuds for $45 (save $14)
  • Bose Ultra Open Earbuds for $249 ($50 off)
  • Soundcore Life Q30 headphones for $52 ($28 off)
  • Shokz OpenRun Pro Bone Conduction Headphones for $125 ($55 off)
  • Jabra Elite 5 Wireless Earbuds for $50 ($100 off)
  • Puro Sound Labs PuroQuiet Kids Headphones for $111 ($28 off)
  • Anker Soundcore AeroFit Workout Headphones for $70 ($60 off)
  • Soundcore by Anker AeroFit Pro Open-Ear Headphones for $100 ($70 off)
  • Beats Fit Pro for $160 ($40 off)
  • Beats Studio Buds + for $130 ($40 off)

Home office and computing deals

  • Branch Ergonomic Chair for $295 ($20 off)
  • Branch Verve Chair for $466 ($83 off)
  • AMD Ryzen 9 7950X 16-Core, 32-Thread Unlocked Desktop Processor for $465 ($220 off)
  • Logitech MX Mechanical Mini Wireless Illuminated Keyboard for $112 ($25 off)
  • Crucial X9 2TB Portable SSD for $109 ($25 off)
  • CORSAIR RM1000x Fully Modular ATX Power Supply for $129 ($61 off)
  • TP-Link AX55 Router for $75 ($25 off)
  • Asus RT-AXE7800 Wi-Fi Router for $229 ($50 off)
  • TP-Link Deco BE85 Mesh Router (2-Pack) for $600 ($400 off)
  • Logitech C920 Pro HD Webcam for $50 ($50 off)
  • Amazon Eero Pro 6E Mesh Wi-Fi Router (3-Pack) for $350 ($200 off)
  • Amazon Eero Max 7 Mesh Wi-Fi Router (3-Pack) for $1,300 ($400 off)
  • Asus ROG Rapture GT6 Mesh Router (2-Pack) for $390 ($90 off)
  • Cherry KC 200 MX Mechanical Keyboard  for $62 ($40 off)
  • Elgato Prompter Teleprompter for $199 ($42 off)
  • Hon Ignition 2.0 Office Chair for $319 ($85 off)
  • Logitech for Creators Blue Yeti USB Microphone for $90 ($40 off)
  • GIGABYTE B650 Gaming X AX ATX Motherboard for $159 ($50 off)
  • Shure SM58 Microphone for $89 ($10 off)
  • Shure SM7B Dynamic Vocal Microphone for $359 ($140 off)
  • Shure SM57 Dynamic Instrument Microphone for $89 ($10 off)
  • Western Digital 1TB WD Blue SA510 SATA Internal SSD for $68 ($17 off)

TV deals

  • Panasonic Streaming 4K Blu Ray Player for $398 ($100 off)
  • Samsung 65-inch S90D QD-OLED TV for $1,379 ($320 off)
  • Hisense 65-inch U7N QLED TV for $700 ($150 off)
  • Sony 65-inch Bravia 9 QLED TV for $2,700 ($300 off)
  • Roku 55-inch Plus Series QLED TV for $430 ($70 off)
  • Hisense 65-inch U8N QLED TV for $900 ($100-$200 off)
  • Sony 65-inch Bravia 7 QLED TV for $1,400 ($400 off)
  • TCL 98-inch QM7 QLED TV for $2,298 ($600 off)

Apple and Apple accessory deals

  • iPad Mini (A17 Pro, 2024) for $469 ($30 off)
  • iMac (M4, 2024) for $1,199 ($97 off)
  • MacBook Pro 14-inch Laptop (M3, Late 2023) for $1,399 ($200 off)
  • Logitech Combo Touch for iPad for $99 ($26 off)
  • MacBook Air 13-Inch Laptop (M3, 2024) for $799 ($250 off)
  • iPad Pro (13-inch, M4, 2024) for $1,099 ($205 off)
  • Apple iPad Air 13-Inch Tablet (M2, 2024) for $699 ($150 off)
  • Apple iPad (10th Generation) for $259 ($125 off)
  • Apple Pencil (1st Gen) Stylus for $59 ($40 off)
  • Apple Pencil Pro Stylus for $94 ($30 off)
  • Apple Studio Display for $1,300 ($200 off)
  • Apple MacBook Pro (M4, 14 Inch, 2024) for $1,399 ($200 off)
  • MacBook Pro (M4 Pro, 16 Inch, 2024) for $2,199 ($300 off)
  • Logitech Casa Pop-Up Desk for $150 ($30 off)
  • Belkin iPhone MagSafe Camera Mount for MacBook for $23 ($7 off)
  • Anker MagGo 3-in-1 Charging Station for $82 ($28 off)
